name: Chicken Quest
description:
When your best friend Sunshine gets captured by evil raccoons, it is up to you, a chicken named Coral, to venture into the forest to save Sunshine and your whole village. Use your cleverness and bravery to win your freedom!

This game was developed by Team Macaroni and Cheese at Girls Make Games 2018. Macaroni and Cheese is composed of Lainey (age 11), Jenna (age 13), and Heather (age 15), and their counselor Jingqi. They made this game in 2 weeks!

For more information on Girls Make Games, visit www.girlsmakegames.com
